title: Sunshine In My Soul
presentation: v1 c v2 c v3 c v4 c

v1: There is sunshine in my soul today,
Than glows in any earthly sky,
v2: There is music in my soul today,
v3: There is springtime in my soul today,
For when the Lord is near,
The dove of peace sings in my heart,
v4: There is gladness in my soul today,
And hope, and praise, and love,
For blessings which He gives me now,
c1: While the peaceful, happy moments roll;
When Jesus shows His smiling face
There is sunshine in my soul.
